name: Heavy Machinery Transport Sim
description:
Heavy Machinery Transport Sim 3D is the best city building game as the user joins the newly launched construction company who is responsible to construct this new city. All type of bridges on-road or off-road is construct with the heavy machinery in this real road builder 3D simulation game
FEATURES

• Real Experience of Driving Heavy Excavator.
• Explore the Construction Site environment.
• Complete all Levels of Driving and Excavation.
• Smooth Steering, Brakes, Lifting and Rotation Controls.
• Amazing 3D Graphics & Environment.
• More levels in updates are coming soon.
